roomTitle: Cozy Loft with a Beautiful View of Dhaka

reviews.name: Hasan
reviews.review: Absolutely loved my stay here! The loft was comfortable and the view was breathtaking.

reviews.name: Prattay
reviews.review: The host was welcoming and the location was convenient. Would recommend to others!

reviews.name: Mehedi
reviews.review: Spent a relaxing weekend at this loft. The rooftop garden was a highlight.

reviews.name: Sithi
reviews.review: Had a great time here. The loft is stylish and the amenities are top-notch.

reviews.name: Asha
reviews.review: Stayed for a business trip. The location was ideal and the space was comfortable for work and rest.

reviews.name: Maruf
reviews.review: The loft was clean and well-maintained. Loved the city view from the windows.

locationDetails: Close to shops, restaurants, and public transport.
locationFullDetails: Dhaka is the capital city of Bangladesh, in southern Asia. Set beside the Buriganga River, it’s at the center of national government, trade and culture. The 17th-century old city was the Mughal capital of Bengal, and many palaces and mosques remain. American architect Louis Khan’s National Parliament House complex typifies the huge, fast-growing modern metropolis.
uniqueFeatures: Rooftop garden with a hammock and BBQ area.
aboutPlace: This loft is a perfect blend of modern design and comfort. With large windows offering city views, you'll feel right at home.
